So the S curve framework is it's a framework that helps you understand what does growth
look like and more importantly, what does it feel like?
There's a lot of theory behind it, which I won't go into today, but here's the framework
itself.
There are three major parts.
There's the launch point, there's a sweet spot and there's mastery.
So at the launch point, you've just arrived in a new country.
Okay.
What experience are you having?
Well, your brain is running a predictive model.
Most of your predictions are inaccurate.
And so, Philpamine, that chemical messenger of delight, it pops.
Okay.

This was not a good idea.

It feels so.
It feels like a slog.
